short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension to export Text Blaze snippets to a PDF file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Text Blaze snippets into easily accessible PDF files with just a click! Whether you're looking to organize your data, share it with others, or preserve it for future use, this extension is your go-to tool.

KEY FEATURES:

üìÑ Export to PDF: Seamlessly convert your Text Blaze snippets into a neatly formatted PDF file, ready for storage or sharing.

üíæ Local File Saving: All PDF files are saved directly to your computer, giving you full control over your data.

üåê Versatile Usage: Use the generated PDFs for various purposes, such as training AI models, maintaining personal records, or sharing information with your team.

Whether you're a professional needing to keep detailed records or someone who wants to make the most out of their Text Blaze snippets, this extension makes the process quick and easy.
